title: Combating Lead Poisoning Through Nutrition Education Act of 2018
content: Combating Lead Poisoning Through Nutrition Education Act of 2018 This bill requires the Department of Agriculture to carry out a nutrition education program to support and award grants for community-wide messaging and outreach on: (1) the harmful impacts of lead exposure. And (2) the important role nutrition plays in a diet protective against lead exposure, especially for children.
